definitions.title: vb. be silent
definitions.body: (Ar. skata id., Lane:1389; Sam. skl pay attention, cf. Thes; Ar. = also be quiet (in gen.), = Syr. skat, a differentiated √ ?);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: declar. shew silence: Imv. ms. [[הַסְכֵּת]] De 27:9 keep silence and listen (cf. [[נִסְכַּת]] Sir 13:23).
